I'm looking for a comfortable gaming headset with good sound, i currently have a Logitech G35.

Which one should I get?
The Astro A40 is pretty nice. I'm sure there are others, so you'll probably get a million suggestions

I got sennheisers recently, not a headset though, just the headphones, but they are awesome.

And they actually create headsets, too! I'm planning on buying one of these. http://en-us.sennheiser.com/gaming-headsets

I recommed buying headphones and a seperate microphone, that way you are more flexibe in choosing you headphones. As a microphone you could choose the Zalman Mic 1, if you can get it, its very cheap (about 6Ã¢â€šÂ¬) and offers decent quality, it can be attached to headphones by cliping it to the cable. Buying sperate headphones offers better performance per money, since most headsets are designated for gamers who choose for design and bright LEDs, not audiophiles who know more about sound.

Yup. A40 user here. It's a great headset.
